snippet.title: Game & Watch - Ball (c)1980 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
Ball was the very first Game and Watch title released to the public way back in 1980. There was speculation for a long time that it didn't use a CPU, but it actually turned out to be the same architecture as the others.  Support was added in MAME 0.211. Credit for this was attributed to "Travis Goodspeed, algestam, hap, Mr. Do, Ryan Holtz, Sean Riddle"

hydef created the artwork which can be found at https://drive.google.com/open?id=1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5
